hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x /home/builder/./build_prod.sh
tray_version="$(cat /home/builder/SRC/tray/version)"
FILE=/home/builder/build_prod/subutai-control-center.deb URL=https://eu0.cdn.subutai.io:8338/kurjun/rest USER=jenkins EMAIL=jenkins@subut.ai PUBLICKEY=$(gpg --armor --export $EMAIL) curl -k "$URL/auth/token?user=$USER" -o /tmp/filetosign rm -rf /tmp/filetosign.asc gpg --armor -u $EMAIL --clearsign /tmp/filetosign TOKEN=$(curl -k -s -Fmessage="`cat /tmp/filetosign.asc`" -Fuser=$USER "$URL/auth/token") echo "-k -v -H \"token: $TOKEN\" -Ffile=@$FILE \"$URL/raw/upload\"" curl -k -v -H "token: $TOKEN" -Ffile=@$FILE -Fversion=$tray_version -Ftoken=$TOKEN "$URL/raw/upload"
FILE=/home/builder/build_prod/SubutaiControlCenter URL=https://eu0.cdn.subutai.io:8338/kurjun/rest USER=jenkins EMAIL=jenkins@subut.ai PUBLICKEY=$(gpg --armor --export $EMAIL) curl -k "$URL/auth/token?user=$USER" -o /tmp/filetosign rm -rf /tmp/filetosign.asc gpg --armor -u $EMAIL --clearsign /tmp/filetosign TOKEN=$(curl -k -s -Fmessage="`cat /tmp/filetosign.asc`" -Fuser=$USER "$URL/auth/token") echo "-k -v -H \"token: $TOKEN\" -Ffile=@$FILE \"$URL/raw/upload\"" curl -k -v -H "token: $TOKEN" -Ffile=@$FILE -Fversion=$tray_version -Ftoken=$TOKEN "$URL/raw/upload"
